channel.title: I made a dumb idea that is now a smart idea
channel.description:
General Neutral special
Passive 1;barrack whispers:you will know everyone who was attacked tonight
Day ability;Armoury control:Using this will prevent all attacks from affecting players. They will get the message”Someone attacked you with a fake weapon!” And you will gain on use of stolen swords per attempted attack(1 use)
Night ability;key check:check if someone has accses to the armory (unlimited uses) Accses according to class Royal blood BD:knight,Prince,hunter Unseen:assasin,mastermind Cult:None Neutral:inq,merc,sellsword,reaper
Night ability 2;stolen swords:attack a player
Win con:eliminate all non key holders

item.title: I made a dumb idea that is now a smart idea
item.dc:creator: DaxJ
item.description:
General
Neutral special

Passive 1;barrack whispers:you will know everyone who was attacked tonight

Day ability;Armoury control:Using this will prevent all attacks from affecting players. They will get the message”Someone attacked you with a fake weapon!” And you will gain on use of stolen swords per attempted attack(1 use)

Night ability;key check:check if someone has accses to the armory (unlimited uses)
Accses according to class
Royal blood
BD:knight,Prince,hunter
Unseen:assasin,mastermind
Cult:None
Neutral:inq,merc,sellsword,reaper

Night ability 2;stolen swords:attack a player

Win con:eliminate all non key holders
